languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на Даргонусе случилась трагедия. Губернатор Драйвстем все последнее время посвящал восстановлению астропатического хора, утраченного из-за варп-штормов. Но собранных им псайкеров поразила неизвестная напасть. Они услышали... нечто, и это свело их в объятья безумия. Астропаты лишились сна, расчесывали кожу до мяса, бормотали невнятицу, а затем начали буйствовать. Их пришлось ликвидировать, и теперь связь с Даргонусом держится лишь на паре самых стойких астропатов. Надолго ли их хватит?"

"Lord Captain, there has been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown affliction. They heard... something, and it cast them into madness. The Astropaths lost sleep, started clawing at their skin to the flesh and muttering gibberish, and eventually went completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на Даргонусе случилась трагедия. Губернатор Драйвстем все последнее время посвящал восстановлению астропатического хора, утраченного из-за варп-штормов. Но собранных им псайкеров поразила неизвестная напасть. Они услышали... нечто, и это свело их в объятья безумия. Астропаты лишились сна, расчесывали кожу до мяса, бормотали невнятицу, а затем начали буйствовать. Их пришлось ликвидировать, и теперь связь с Даргонусом держится лишь на паре самых стойких астропатов. Надолго ли их хватит?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there's been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropath choir that had been lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown attack. They have heard... something, and it casted them into madness. The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin until it bled, muttered some gibberish, and then they have gone berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But for how long will they last?"

The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin until it bled, muttered some gibberish, and then they have gone berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But for how long will they last?"

languages.text: “舰长大人，达戈努斯发生了一场悲剧。之前的星语唱诗班由于遭受亚空间风暴而遭受了人员损失，德莱夫斯塔总督也一直在致力于填补空缺。然而，他召集而来的灵能者遭到了原因不明的袭击。那些灵能者听到了……某种东西，然后全都发了疯。他们彻夜不眠，一边撕扯着他们的皮肤，一边喃喃自语，彻底丧失了理性，我们不得不消灭他们。如今，只有一小部分意志坚强的星语者仍在努力维持着我们与达戈努斯的之间联系，但他们还能坚持多久呢？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown assault. They heard... something, and it has cast them into madness. The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin to the flesh, muttered gibberish, and now they have gone completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

“舰长大人，达戈努斯发生了一场悲剧。之前的星语唱诗班由于遭受亚空间风暴而遭受了人员损失，德莱夫斯塔总督也一直在致力于填补空缺。然而，他召集而来的灵能者遭到了原因不明的袭击。那些灵能者听到了……某种东西，然后全都发了疯。他们彻夜不眠，一边撕扯着他们的皮肤，一边喃喃自语，彻底丧失了理性，我们不得不消灭他们。如今，只有一小部分意志坚强的星语者仍在努力维持着我们与达戈努斯的之间联系，但他们还能坚持多久呢？”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ha ocurrido una tragedia en Dargonus. El Gobernador Drivestem ha estado dedicando la mayor parte de su tiempo a restaurar el Coro de Astrópatas perdido por las tormentas de la disformidad. Pero los psíquicos que reunió fueron alcanzados por un ataque desconocido. Oyeron... algo, y les ha sumido en la locura. Los Astrópatas han perdido el sueño, se han arañado la piel hasta la carne, han murmurado sandeces, y ahora se han vuelto completamente locos. Tuvieron que ser eliminados, y ahora solo unos pocos Astrópatas de los más resistentes mantienen la conexión con Dargonus. Pero, ¿cuánto tiempo durarán?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown assault. They heard... something, and it has cast them into madness. The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin to the flesh, muttered gibberish, and now they have gone completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ha ocurrido una tragedia en Dargonus. El Gobernador Drivestem ha estado dedicando la mayor parte de su tiempo a restaurar el Coro de Astrópatas perdido por las tormentas de la disformidad. Pero los psíquicos que reunió fueron alcanzados por un ataque desconocido. Oyeron... algo, y les ha sumido en la locura. Los Astrópatas han perdido el sueño, se han arañado la piel hasta la carne, han murmurado sandeces, y ahora se han vuelto completamente locos. Tuvieron que ser eliminados, y ahora solo unos pocos Astrópatas de los más resistentes mantienen la conexión con Dargonus. Pero, ¿cuánto tiempo durarán?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスで悲劇が起きました。ドライブステム総督は、〈歪み〉の嵐で失われた感応通信官聖歌隊の復活にほとんどの時間を割いていました。ところが、彼が集めた異能者たちが正体不明の攻撃に襲われたのです。彼らは...何かを耳にしたようです。そしてそれによって狂気に陥れたのです。感応通信官は眠れなくなり、皮膚に爪を立てて肉を裂き、わけのわからない言葉をつぶやき、完全に発狂してしまいました。彼らは排除されるほかありませんでした。そして今、耐久力の優れた数人の感応通信官だけでダルゴナスとのつながりを維持している状態です。彼らもどれほどもつか分かりません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown assault. They heard... something, and it has cast them into madness. The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin to the flesh, muttered gibberish, and now they have gone completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスで悲劇が起きました。ドライブステム総督は、〈歪み〉の嵐で失われた感応通信官聖歌隊の復活にほとんどの時間を割いていました。ところが、彼が集めた異能者たちが正体不明の攻撃に襲われたのです。彼らは...何かを耳にしたようです。そしてそれによって狂気に陥れたのです。感応通信官は眠れなくなり、皮膚に爪を立てて肉を裂き、わけのわからない言葉をつぶやき、完全に発狂してしまいました。彼らは排除されるほかありませんでした。そして今、耐久力の優れた数人の感応通信官だけでダルゴナスとのつながりを維持している状態です。彼らもどれほどもつか分かりません」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Dargonus a été frappée par une tragédie ! Le gouverneur Drivestem a dédié le plus clair de son temps à restaurer le chœur astropathique perdu dans les tempêtes du Warp, mais les psykers qu'il a rassemblés ont été victimes d'une affliction inconnue. Ils ont entendu... quelque chose qui les a fait sombrer dans la folie. Les astropathes ont perdu le sommeil, se griffant jusqu'au sang en marmonnant des propos sans queue ni tête... Ils sont devenus fous furieux et il a fallu les éliminer. L'ennui, c'est qu'il n'en reste plus que quelques-uns, les plus résistants, pour maintenir la connexion avec Dargonus... mais combien de temps tiendront-ils ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown affliction. They heard... something, and it cast them into madness. The Astropaths lost sleep, started clawing at their skin to the flesh and muttering gibberish, and eventually went completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, Dargonus a été frappée par une tragédie ! Le gouverneur Drivestem a dédié le plus clair de son temps à restaurer le chœur astropathique perdu dans les tempêtes du Warp, mais les psykers qu'il a rassemblés ont été victimes d'une affliction inconnue. Ils ont entendu... quelque chose qui les a fait sombrer dans la folie. Les astropathes ont perdu le sommeil, se griffant jusqu'au sang en marmonnant des propos sans queue ni tête... Ils sont devenus fous furieux et il a fallu les éliminer. L'ennui, c'est qu'il n'en reste plus que quelques-uns, les plus résistants, pour maintenir la connexion avec Dargonus... mais combien de temps tiendront-ils ? »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es gab eine Tragödie auf Dargonus. Gouverneur Drivestem hat einen Großteil seiner Zeit damit zugebracht, den astropathischen Chor wiederaufzubauen, den die Warpstürme gefordert haben. Doch die Psioniker, die er versammelt hat, wurden von einem unbekannten Feind angegriffen. Sie haben etwas gehört, was sie in den Wahnsinn getrieben hat. Die Astropathen konnten nicht mehr schlafen, haben sich die Haut vom Fleisch gekratzt, haben unaufhörlich wirres Zeug gemurmelt, und nun sind sie vollkommen wahnsinnig geworden. Sie mussten eliminiert werden, und nur einige wenige der robusteren Astropathen halten noch die Verbindung zu Dargonus. Aber wie lange werden sie noch durchhalten?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there's been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown assault. They heard... something, and it has cast them into madness. The Astropaths have lost sleep, clawed at their skin to the flesh, muttered gibberish, and now they have gone completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

Die Astropathen konnten nicht mehr schlafen, haben sich die Haut vom Fleisch gekratzt, haben unaufhörlich wirres Zeug gemurmelt, und nun sind sie vollkommen wahnsinnig geworden. Sie mussten eliminiert werden, und nur einige wenige der robusteren Astropathen halten noch die Verbindung zu Dargonus. Aber wie lange werden sie noch durchhalten?"

"Lord Captain, es gab eine Tragödie auf Dargonus. Gouverneur Drivestem hat einen Großteil seiner Zeit damit zugebracht, den astropathischen Chor wiederaufzubauen, den die Warpstürme gefordert haben. Doch die Psioniker, die er versammelt hat, wurden von einem unbekannten Feind angegriffen. Sie haben etwas gehört, was sie in den Wahnsinn getrieben hat. Die Astropathen konnten nicht mehr schlafen, haben sich die Haut vom Fleisch gekratzt, haben unaufhörlich wirres Zeug gemurmelt, und nun sind sie vollkommen wahnsinnig geworden. Sie mussten eliminiert werden, und nur einige wenige der robusteren Astropathen halten noch die Verbindung zu Dargonus. Aber wie lange werden sie noch durchhalten?"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Dargonus'ta bir trajedi yaşanmış. Vali Drivestem, zamanının büyük kısmını öteboyut fırtınalarında kaybettiğimiz Astropatik Koro'yu eski hâline getirmeye adamıştı. Ancak topladığı ruhsezerler, bilinmeyen bir musibetten muzdarip. Duydukları... Bir şeyler, onları deliliğe sürüklemiş. Astropatlar uyku bilmez olmuş, derilerini tırmalayarak etlerine kadar yarmışlar, anlamsız sözler geveleyip durmuşlar ve en sonunda cinnete tamamen yenik düşmüşler. Ortadan kaldırılmaları gerektiği için Dargonus ile bağlantıyı koruyanlar, artık bir avuç metanetli Astropattan ibaret. Onlar ne kadar dayanabilecek ki?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been a tragedy on Dargonus. Governor Drivestem has been dedicating most of his time to restoring the Astropathic Choir lost to the warp storms. But the psykers he assembled were struck by an unknown affliction. They heard... something, and it cast them into madness. The Astropaths lost sleep, started clawing at their skin to the flesh and muttering gibberish, and eventually went completely berserk. They had to be eliminated, and now only a few of the most resilient Astropaths are upholding the connection to Dargonus. But how long will they last?"

Ancak topladığı ruhsezerler, bilinmeyen bir musibetten muzdarip. Duydukları... Bir şeyler, onları deliliğe sürüklemiş. Astropatlar uyku bilmez olmuş, derilerini tırmalayarak etlerine kadar yarmışlar, anlamsız sözler geveleyip durmuşlar ve en sonunda cinnete tamamen yenik düşmüşler. Ortadan kaldırılmaları gerektiği için Dargonus ile bağlantıyı koruyanlar, artık bir avuç metanetli Astropattan ibaret. Onlar ne kadar dayanabilecek ki?"
